script_line: A group of muscular cavemen in their 20s with long brown hair and beards walks through a rugged prehistoric landscape, returning to their cave after a hunt, carrying crude spears and animal hides.
The cavemen enter a dark, rocky cave with rough stone walls, setting down their hunting gear near the entrance.
One caveman kneels in the cave, striking flint stones together to create sparks, starting a small fire in a pit surrounded by rocks.
The caveman places raw meat on a flat stone over the now-blazing fire, smoke rising as the meat begins to cook, while others sit nearby watching.
